Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I recently upgraded my heavily modded KSP install by basically making a separate new install and transferring the savefile after re-installing all the mods. It works, but the resources locations on the surface of various bodies have changed. I have updated the planet pack I use but I assume that this is mostly because those resources are procedurally generated. Those are USI resources managed by CRP

I'll try to keep it short but basically :

-Is the resource location stored somewhere ? Could I mess with the file with some kind of tool or copy my old one perhaps ?

-Otherwise, is there a way to force 'refresh' the resources generation once I messed up with the .cfg file of the corresponding resource ? I guess I could get it to work that way

hi

Edited June 4, 2018 by Cmdr Hawkeyez
